languages.text: "Ага, то есть водица еще и целебная? Ну-ну! Не поверю, пока сама эти "чудесные исцеления" не увижу. Слижком уж это хорошо, чтобы быть правдой..."

traits.locale_text: "Не поверю, пока сама не увижу! Слижком уж это хорошо, чтобы быть правдой..."

languages.text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."
languages.original_text: "Ага, то есть водица еще и целебная? Ну-ну! Не поверю, пока сама эти "чудесные исцеления" не увижу. Слижком уж это хорошо, чтобы быть правдой..."

traits.locale_text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course it does. Well, I'll believe in a miracle healing when I see one. Sounds way too good to be true..."
"Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course it does. Well, I'll believe in a miracle healing when I see one. Sounds way too good to be true..."
"Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in a "miraculous healings" when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."
"Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in a "miraculous healings" when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."
"Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."
"Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."

languages.text: “是啊，所以那些水也有‘特别的力量’，对不对！我就知道你们会这么说。好吧，等我哪天亲眼看到这些‘奇迹’的话，我也会相信。听起来太玄了，根本不像真的……”
languages.original_text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，所以那些水也有‘特别的力量’，对不对！我就知道你们好这么说。好吧，等我哪天亲眼看到这些‘奇迹’的话，我也会相信的。听起来太玄了，根本不像真的……”

languages.text: 「へぇ。水には『力』があると。『奇跡の回復』までするんだよな？そんな都合のいい話があるわけないだろう…」
languages.original_text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."

traits.locale_text: 「へぇ。水には『力』があると。『奇跡の回復』までするんだよな？そんな都合のいい話があるわけないだろう…」

languages.text: «Claro, ¡así que el agua también tiene "poderes"! Claro que sí. Creeré en una "curación milagrosa" cuando la vea. Suena demasiado bueno para ser verdad...».
languages.original_text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."

traits.locale_text: «Claro, ¡así que el agua también tiene "poderes"! Claro que sí. Creeré en una "curación milagrosa" cuando la vea. Suena demasiado bueno para ser verdad...».

languages.text: "Genau, jetzt hat das Wasser also auch noch 'Kräfte'! War ja klar. Tja, also ich glaube erst an diese 'Wunderheilungen', wenn ich eine gesehen habe. Das klingt viel zu gut, um wahr zu sein ..."
languages.original_text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."

traits.locale_text: "Genau, jetzt hat das Wasser also auch noch 'Kräfte'! War ja klar. Tja, also ich glaube erst an 'Wunderheilungen', wenn ich eine gesehen habe. Das klingt viel zu gut, um wahr zu sein ..."

languages.text: « Alors comme ça, cette fameuse eau aurait aussi des pouvoirs ? Évidemment... Mais c'est vraiment trop beau pour être vrai. Moi, je croirai en ces histoires de guérison miraculeuse quand je le verrai de mes propres yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."

traits.locale_text: « Alors comme ça, cette fameuse eau aurait aussi des pouvoirs ? Évidemment... Mais c'est trop beau pour être vrai. Moi, je croirai en ces histoires de guérison miraculeuse quand je le verrai de mes propres yeux. »

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. Demek suyun 'güçleri' var! Tabii canım... Neden olmasın? Bu 'mucize iyileşmeleri' görmeden inanmam. Kulağa gerçek olamayacak kadar güzel geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Right, so the water's got 'powers,' too! Because of course, it does. Well, I'll believe in these 'miraculous healings' when I see one. It sounds way too good to be true..."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ. Demek suyun 'güçleri' de var! Var çünkü. Neden olmasın? Bu 'mucize şifalar'ı görmeden inanmam. Kulağa, gerçek olamayacak kadar güzel geliyor."
